Class GUI

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.View.GUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
RemoteUI, Serializable, Remote
public class GUI extends Object implements RemoteUI
This class represents the GUI interface for the game.

    • playTurn

      public void playTurn() throws IOException, VoidBoardTileException, SelectionNotValidException, PlayerIsWaitingException, TilesSelectionSizeDifferentFromOrderLengthException, ColumnNotValidException, WrongConfigurationException, PickedColumnOutOfBoundsException, PickDoesntFitColumnException, SelectionIsEmptyException, WrongMessageClassEnumException, InterruptedException
      Initiates the player's turn and handles the turn selection process.
      Specified by:
      playTurn in interface RemoteUI
      Throws:
      IOException - if there is an I/O error during the process
      VoidBoardTileException - if a board tile is void
      SelectionNotValidException - if the selection is not valid
      PlayerIsWaitingException - if the player is waiting
      TilesSelectionSizeDifferentFromOrderLengthException - if the size of the tiles selection is different from the order length
      ColumnNotValidException - if the column is not valid
      WrongConfigurationException - if the configuration is wrong
      PickedColumnOutOfBoundsException - if the picked column is out of bounds
      PickDoesntFitColumnException - if the pick doesn't fit in the column
      SelectionIsEmptyException - if the selection is empty
      WrongMessageClassEnumException - if the message class enumeration is wrong
      InterruptedException - if the process is interrupted
